title: .pt Archives don't generate after project running
body:
Hi i'm running the following code that can be found here : https://github.com/GutiPerez/bachelor_thesis_uc3m/blob/master/mnist_network/mnist_snn.py 
and i'm using my own raw archives. I've generated the ubyte and the .gz archives with MNIST format 56x28 pixels images. 

First with the raw folder empty I ran the code with download = True, when the download of the training_dataset and the test_dataset is completed the MNIST 28x28 pixel archives appeared and the network runs using them. Then when it's over, I delete these files and paste my 56x28 archives in the raw folder and ran the code again with download = False (and obviously changing the dimensions of the input to fit the 56 height)

here in line 157 : 
train_dataset = MNIST(
    # The encoding applied to the input data.
    PoissonEncoder(time=time, dt=dt),
    None,
    # Folder where the dataset files are stored.
    root="./data",
    # Wheter to download the dataset (the download page usually fails, so using a local copy is recommended).
    download=True, #False after first download <-------------------------------------
    # Wheter to use train or test files.
    train=True,
    # The transformation applied to the encoded input data.
    transform=transforms.Compose(
        [transforms.ToTensor(), transforms.Lambda(lambda x: x * intensity)]
    ),
)

But the .pt archives do not appear in the processed folder which keeps being empty after the running is complete. Why am i not receiving the .pt? Why are they not being generated in the processed folder? 

Thanks in advance
